input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "JAXXON"
Reference Product Name: "14k Silver Cuban Link Chain - 8mm"
Reference Product Description:
Introducing our silver 8mm stainless steel Cuban Link Chain â€“ a statement of timeless elegance and enduring strength. Crafted with precision and exceptional resiliency, this chain is designed to withstand tarnishing, corrosion, and daily wear. Elevate your style with its bold 8mm gauge and classic Cuban link design, making it the perfect choice for any occasions.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Figaro Silver'
  - Name='JAXXON 10mm Iced Out Cuban Silver Chain Set'
  - Name='JAXXON 5mm Iced Out Cuban Chain Set'
  - Name='CRAFTD 3MM Figaro Chain'
  - Name='18mm Classic Iced Miami Cuban Link Chain'
  - Name='King Ice 3mm Rope Chain Hip Hop Jewelry'
  - Name='CRAFTD 5MM Rope Chain'
  - Name='JAXXON St. Michael Silver Pendant Chain'
  - Name='Figaro Set'
  - Name='CRAFTD London 2mm Rope'
  - Name='JAXXON 5mm Iced Out Cuban Gold Set'
  - Name='JAXXON 8mm Women's Iced Out Cuban Link'
  - Name='JAXXON 8mm Cuban Silver Set'
  - Name='Men's Cuban Link Chain 2mm'
  - Name='Prong Link Iced Cuban'
  - Name='CRAFTD London Silver 8MM Cuban Link Chain'
  - Name='CRAFTD London Connell Chain'
  - Name='JAXXON Cuban Link Silver Bracelet'
  - Name='Men's Cali Chain 2mm'
  - Name='CRAFTD 3MM Gold Wheat Chain'
  - Name='JAXXON 8mm Cuban Black Set'
  - Name='CRAFTD Men's Miami Cuban Link Chain'
  - Name='CRAFTD London 12mm Gold Cuban Chain'
  - Name='King Ice 1mm Box Chain Hip Hop Jewelry'
  - Name='CRAFTD London Gold Snake Chain Necklace'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is a Figaro chain, which differs in link style from a Cuban link, so less similar in silhouette and construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 10mm Iced Out Cuban Silver Chain Set
scores_with_rationales.rationale: It is a Cuban link chain with a similar material but thicker gauge and iced out style, so highly relevant but not identical.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 5mm Iced Out Cuban Chain Set
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A Cuban link chain, smaller gauge (5mm), iced out style; relevant but differs in size and adornment.
Figaro style with only 3mm gauge; quite different design and thinner, thus low relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 18mm Classic Iced Miami Cuban Link Chain
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A very thick (18mm) Cuban link chain with iced out finish; same chain style but bigger and more elaborate.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: King Ice 3mm Rope Chain Hip Hop Jewelry
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Rope chain style and only 3mm thick have very different silhouette and construction from Cuban link.
Rope chain style, 5mm gauge, differs substantially from Cuban link chain in design.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON St. Michael Silver Pendant Chain
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pendant chain likely thinner and not Cuban link; less similar in silhouette and construction.
Figaro chain style set, differs from Cuban link design and construction.
Very thin 2mm rope chain vastly different from a bold 8mm Cuban link chain.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 5mm Iced Out Cuban Gold Set
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Cuban link style and similar features but smaller gauge and gold plating instead of silver.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 8mm Women's Iced Out Cuban Link
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Exactly 8mm Cuban link chain with iced out style targeting women; very close product type and size.
Same 8mm Cuban link chain in silver, exact match with possible additional pieces in set.
Same Cuban link design but much thinner 2mm gauge; moderate relevancy due to style.
Iced Cuban link with prong details; similar construction and style but iced out finish adds difference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: CRAFTD London Silver 8MM Cuban Link Chain
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Matches reference in gauge, material, and link style, just different brand.
Connell chain is a different chain style; not similar in silhouette or construction to Cuban link.
Cuban link style but a bracelet, so smaller silhouette and different usage.
Cali chain style with 2mm gauge differs significantly from an 8mm Cuban link chain in style and size.
Wheat chain style is very distinct, 3mm gauge and gold material differs from Cuban link chain.
Same 8mm Cuban link chain in black finish; highly relevant as same size and style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: CRAFTD Men's Miami Cuban Link Chain
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Miami Cuban link is a variation of Cuban link chain; assumed similar in size, relevant but not exact.
Cuban chain style but thicker (12mm) and gold; similar construction but differs in size and color.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: King Ice 1mm Box Chain Hip Hop Jewelry
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Very thin 1mm box chain is a different chain style and vastly smaller gauge than reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: CRAFTD London Gold Snake Chain Necklace
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Snake chain is a different type of chain with distinct silhouette and construction unrelated to Cuban link.
